scripts.chatkit-starter: npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter install && npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter start
scripts.cozy-cat-lounge: npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge install && npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge start
scripts.customer-support: npm --prefix apps/customer-support install && npm --prefix apps/customer-support start
scripts.news-guide: npm --prefix apps/news-guide install && npm --prefix apps/news-guide start
scripts.metro-map: npm --prefix apps/metro-map install && npm --prefix apps/metro-map start
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:chatkit-starter && npm run test:e2e:cozy-cat-lounge && npm run test:e2e:customer-support && npm run test:e2e:metro-map && npm run test:e2e:news-guide
scripts.test:e2e:chatkit-starter: npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter install && npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:cozy-cat-lounge: npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge install && npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:customer-support: npm --prefix apps/customer-support install && npm --prefix apps/customer-support run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:metro-map: npm --prefix apps/metro-map install && npm --prefix apps/metro-map run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:news-guide: npm --prefix apps/news-guide install && npm --prefix apps/news-guide run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:ui:all: npm run test:e2e:ui:chatkit-starter && npm run test:e2e:ui:cozy-cat-lounge && npm run test:e2e:ui:customer-support && npm run test:e2e:ui:metro-map && npm run test:e2e:ui:news-guide
scripts.test:e2e:ui:chatkit-starter: npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter install && npm --prefix apps/chatkit-starter run test:e2e:ui
scripts.test:e2e:ui:cozy-cat-lounge: npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge install && npm --prefix apps/cozy-cat-lounge run test:e2e:ui
scripts.test:e2e:ui:customer-support: npm --prefix apps/customer-support install && npm --prefix apps/customer-support run test:e2e:ui
scripts.test:e2e:ui:metro-map: npm --prefix apps/metro-map install && npm --prefix apps/metro-map run test:e2e:ui
scripts.test:e2e:ui:news-guide: npm --prefix apps/news-guide install && npm --prefix apps/news-guide run test:e2e:ui
